mapper.select: select id, user_id, oss_details, file_type, create_time, update_time, db_name, tables, host, username, password from work_platform.download_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into work_platform.download_info(user_id, oss_details, file_type, create_time, update_time, db_name, tables, host, username, password) values (#{userId}, #{ossDetails}, #{fileType}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{dbName}, #{tables}, #{host}, #{username}, #{password})

insert into work_platform.download_info(user_id, oss_details, file_type, create_time, update_time, db_name, tables, host, username, password) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.ossDetails}, #{entity.fileType}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.dbName}, #{entity.tables}, #{entity.host}, #{entity.username}, #{entity.password})

insert into work_platform.download_info(user_id, oss_details, file_type, create_time, update_time, db_name, tables, host, username, password) values
(#{entity.userId}, #{entity.ossDetails}, #{entity.fileType}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.dbName}, #{entity.tables}, #{entity.host}, #{entity.username}, #{entity.password})
on duplicate key update user_id = values(user_id) , oss_details = values(oss_details) , file_type = values(file_type) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time) , db_name = values(db_name) , tables = values(tables) , host = values(host) , username = values(username) , password = values(password)
mapper.update:
update work_platform.download_info
user_id = #{userId},
oss_details = #{ossDetails},
file_type = #{fileType},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
db_name = #{dbName},
tables = #{tables},
host = #{host},
username = #{username},
password = #{password},
where id = #{id}
